Class Blaster

java.lang.Object
weapons.Weapon
weapons.Blaster
public class Blaster extends Weapon
Represents a blaster which shoots out ammo
Version:
05262024
Author:
Ohm Bhakta, Yujun Lee

  • Constructor Details

    • Blaster

      public Blaster(int damage, double xOffset, double yOffset, double zOffset, processing.core.PApplet g)
      Sets up the location of the blaster and what direction the blaster is pointed to
      Parameters:
      damage - The amount of damage the blaster does
      xOffset - the x-distance between the player and the Blaster
      yOffset - the y-distance between the player and the Blaster
      zOffset - the z-distance between the player and the Blaster
      g - the PApplet in which the Blaster is drawn

  • Method Details

      Shoots an ammo at the direction the blaster is currently pointed at
      Parameters:
      p - the position of the Player
      f - the direction Player is facing
